overview: A documentary about the beauty in overcoming fear and other challenges facing humanity as seen by icons of pro skating, science, art, music, activism, and education, all of whom share experiences and perspectives shaped by their love of skateboarding. The conversations focus on understanding fear, depression, addiction, education, activism, philanthropy, racism, sexism, homophobia, and the environment. The filmâ€™s purpose is to inspire deeper thinking, more empathic perspectives, and open conversations about human issues.
title: Humanity Stoked
